value:
Recruitable Heroes:
You can only recruit Heroes that
were released between Ver. 1.0
and Ver. 5.11.

You cannot recruit Heroes you
dispatch, or the Alfonse, Sharena,
or Anna from another world.

To celebrate the arrival of
Book VIII, a new castle design
is ready for you to use!

Take a look!

Having checked out the
Yggdrasill Castle design,
do you want to use it?

If you change your mind, tap
Upgrade Castle, then Change
Design, then Yggdrasill Castle.

A statue of a denizen of Yggdrasill, the realm
of the World-Tree. You feel its healing power
wash over you when nearby. It's an event item.

Gate of Yggdrasill, realm of the World-Tree.
The silence that surrounds the mystical tree
calms the heart. It's an event item.

A wanted poster from Yggdrasill, realm of the
World-Tree. Who put it up, and why? It's an
event item.

Used in Aether Raids to build structures that
are available for a limited time. If that period
has elapsed, these stones will be lost.
